TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Paran, title = Paran, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paran} }

S.FORM: paran Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko paran a niyaro', 686 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,940 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 590 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,350 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq17%, Tayal10%, Bunun2%, Paiwan1%.

paran Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko paran a niyaro', 686 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,940 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 590 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,350 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Seediq17%, Tayal10%, Bonon2%, Paiwan1%.
